00098             function                get_list_of_packages()
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_config( __FILE__ , 'cf_search_access' , 'exploded' );
00103                         $Settigs = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00104                         $Packages = array();
00105                         
00106                         foreach( $Config as $i => $ConfigLine )
00107                         {
00108                               $Settigs->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
00109                               
00110                               $PackageName = $Settigs->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00111                               $PackageVersion = $Settigs->get_setting( 'package_version' );
00112                               
00113                               $Packages [] = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         return( $Packages );
00117                   }
00118                   catch( Exception $e )
00119                   {
00120                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00121                   }
00122             }

00150             function                get_records( &$Packages , $SearchString )
00151             {
00152                   try
00153                   {
00154                         $Results = array();
00155                         
00156                         $Limitations = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_output_limitations' , 'string' , '' );
00157                         $Limitations = explode( ',' , $Limitations );
00158                         
00159                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $Package )
00160                         {
00161                               $Results [] = call_user_func( 
00162                                     array( $Package , 'search' ) , get_field( $Limitations , $i , 0 ) , $SearchString
00163                               );
00164                         }
00165                         
00166                         return( $Results );
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }

00196             function                filter_results( $Results )
00197             {
00198                   try
00199                   {
00200                         foreach( $Results as $i => $Records )
00201                         {
00202                               $Return = array();
00203                               
00204                               foreach( $Records as $j => $Record )
00205                               {
00206                                     $Relevation = intval( get_field( $Record , 'relevation' ) );
00207                                     if( $Relevation > 0 )
00208                                     {
00209                                           $Return [] = $Record;
00210                                     }
00211                               }
00212                               
00213                               $Results[ $i ] = $Return;
00214                         }
00215                         
00216                         return( $Results );
00217                   }
00218                   catch( Exception $e )
00219                   {
00220                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00221                   }
00222             }

00246             function                get_maximum_relevation( $Records )
00247             {
00248                   try
00249                   {
00250                         $MaxRelevation = 0;
00251                         
00252                         if( isset( $Records[ 0 ] ) )
00253                         {
00254                               $MaxRelevation = intval( get_field( $Records[ 0 ] , 'relevation' ) );
00255                               
00256                               foreach( $Records as $j => $Record )
00257                               {
00258                                     $Tmp = intval( get_field( $Record , 'relevation' ) );
00259                                     if( $Tmp > $MaxRelevation )
00260                                     {
00261                                           $MaxRelevation = $Tmp;
00262                                     }
00263                               }
00264                         }
00265                         
00266                         return( $MaxRelevation );
00267                   }
00268                   catch( Exception $e )
00269                   {
00270                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00271                   }
00272             }

00296             function                normalize_relevation( &$Results )
00297             {
00298                   try
00299                   {
00300                         $Return = array();
00301                         
00302                         foreach( $Results as $i => $Records )
00303                         {
00304                               $MaxRelevation = $this->get_maximum_relevation( $Records );
00305                               
00306                               foreach( $Records as $j => $Record )
00307                               {
00308                                     set_field( 
00309                                           $Results[ $i ][ $j ] , 'relevation' , 
00310                                           intval( get_field( $Results[ $i ][ $j ] , 'relevation' ) ) / $MaxRelevation
00311                                     );
00312                               }
00313                         }
00314                         
00315                         return( $Results );
00316                   }
00317                   catch( Exception $e )
00318                   {
00319                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00320                   }
00321             }

00345             function                get_search_line( &$Results )
00346             {
00347                   try
00348                   {
00349                         $SearchLine = array();
00350                         
00351                         /* setting fetches ids */
00352                         foreach( $Results as $i => $Result )
00353                         {
00354                               foreach( $Result as $j => $Record )
00355                               {
00356                                     set_field( $Results[ $i ][ $j ] , 'fetch_id' , $i );
00357                               }
00358                         }
00359                         
00360                         /* composing records */
00361                         foreach( $Results as $i => $Result )
00362                         {
00363                               $SearchLine = array_merge( $SearchLine , $Result );
00364                         }
00365                         
00366                         return( array_slice( $SearchLine , 0 , 10 ) );
00367                   }
00368                   catch( Exception $e )
00369                   {
00370                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00371                   }
00372             }

00400             function                prepare_for_output( $SearchLine , $SearchString )
00401             {
00402                   try
00403                   {
00404                         foreach( $SearchLine as $i => $Result )
00405                         {
00406                               $Position = strpos( $Text = get_field( $Result , 'record_text' ) , $SearchString );
00407                               $Length = strlen( $Text );
00408                               $PreviewSize = 512;
00409                               $LeftBorder = ( $Position - $PreviewSize > 0 ? $Position - $PreviewSize : 0 );
00410                               $RightBorder = ( $Position + $PreviewSize > $Length ? $Length : $Position + $PreviewSize );
00411                               
00412                               $Preview = substr( $Text , $LeftBorder , $RightBorder - $LeftBorder );
00413                               
00414                               $Preview = ( $LeftBorder ? '...' : '' ).$Preview.( $RightBorder != $Length ? '...' : '' );
00415                               
00416                               $Preview = str_replace( 
00417                                     $SearchString , "<span class=\"search_hilight\">$SearchString</span>" , $Preview
00418                               );
00419                               
00420                               set_field( $Result , 'record_text' , $Preview );
00421                         }
00422                         
00423                         return( $SearchLine );
00424                   }
00425                   catch( Exception $e )
00426                   {
00427                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00428                   }
00429             }

00453             function                get_next_page_limitations( &$SearchLine )
00454             {
00455                   try
00456                   {
00457                         if( isset( $SearchLine[ 9 ] ) === false )
00458                         {
00459                               return( '' );
00460                         }
00461                         
00462                         $Limitations = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_output_limitations' , 'string' , '' );
00463                         $Limitations = explode( ',' , $Limitations );
00464                         
00465                         foreach( $SearchLine as $i => $Record )
00466                         {
00467                               $FetchId = get_field( $Record , 'fetch_id' );
00468                               
00469                               $Limitations[ $FetchId ]++;
00470                         }
00471                         
00472                         return( implode( ',' , $Limitations ) );
00473                   }
00474                   catch( Exception $e )
00475                   {
00476                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00477                   }
00478             }

00502             function                get_switch_page_controler( &$SearchLine )
00503             {
00504                   try
00505                   {
00506                         $Arrows = array();
00507                         
00508                         $CurrentLimitations = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_output_limitations' , 'string' , '' );
00509                         if( $CurrentLimitations != '' )
00510                         {
00511                               $Arrows [] = "<a href=\"javascript:window.history.go( -1 );\">&larr</a>";
00512                         }
00513                         
00514                         $NextLimitations = $this->get_next_page_limitations( $SearchLine );
00515                         if( $NextLimitations != '' )
00516                         {
00517                               $SearchString = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_string' , 'string' );
00518                               $Page = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page' , 'integer' , 0 ) + 1;
00519                               $Arrows [] = "<a href=\"./search_results.html?search_string=$SearchString&".
00520                                     "search_output_limitations=$NextLimitations&page=$Page\">&rarr</a>";
00521                         }
00522                         
00523                         return( '<div class="search_switch_page_controller">'.implode( '&nbsp;' , $Arrows ).'</div>' );
00524                   }
00525                   catch( Exception $e )
00526                   {
00527                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00528                   }
00529             }

00549             function                output_search_results( &$SearchLine )
00550             {
00551                   try
00552                   {
00553                         $this->Output = '';
00554                         
00555                         foreach( $SearchLine as $i => $Result )
00556                         {
00557                               $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/search_item.tpl';
00558                               $this->Output .= $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00559                               
00560                               $this->Output = $this->String->print_record( $this->Output , $Result );
00561                               $this->Output = str_replace( 
00562                                     '{item_number}' , 
00563                                     $this->Security->get_gp( 'page' , 'integer' , 0 ) * 10 + $i + 1 , $this->Output
00564                               );
00565                         }
00566                         
00567                         $this->Output .= $this->get_switch_page_controler( $SearchLine );
00568                   }
00569                   catch( Exception $e )
00570                   {
00571                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00572                   }
00573             }

00589             function                search_results()
00590             {
00591                   try
00592                   {
00593                         $Packages = $this->get_list_of_packages();
00594                         
00595                         $SearchString = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_string' , 'string' , false );
00596                         
00597                         if( $SearchString !== false )
00598                         {
00599                               $Records = $this->get_records( $Packages , $SearchString );
00600                               
00601                               $FilteredRecords = $this->filter_results( $Records );
00602                               
00603                               $NormalizedRecords = $this->normalize_relevation( $FilteredRecords );
00604                               
00605                               $SearchLine = $this->get_search_line( $NormalizedRecords );
00606                               
00607                               $SearchLine = $this->prepare_for_output( $SearchLine , $SearchString );
00608                               
00609                               $this->output_search_results( $SearchLine );
00610                         }
00611                   }
00612                   catch( Exception $e )
00613                   {
00614                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00615                   }
00616             }

00640             function                view( $Options )
00641             {
00642                   try
00643                   {
00644                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00645                         
00646                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_search_form' );
00647                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_search_results' );
00648                         
00649                         if( $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ ) )return( $this->Output );
00650                         
00651                         return( $this->Output );
00652                   }
00653                   catch( Exception $e )
00654                   {
00655                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00656                   }

00681             function                compile_search_form( &$Settings )
00682             {
00683                   try
00684                   {
00685                         list( $Speed , $Prefix , $FormId , $Action ) = $this->BlockSettings->get_settings( 
00686                               'speed,prefix,form_id,action' , '500,common,search_form,'
00687                         );
00688                         
00689                         $TemplateFileName = $Prefix == 'common' ? 'common_search_form.tpl' : 'custom_search_form.tpl';
00690                         
00691                         $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $TemplateFileName );
00692                         
00693                         $Code = str_replace( 
00694                               array( '{speed}' , '{prefix}' , '{form_id}' , '{action}' ) , 
00695                               array( $Speed , $Prefix , $FormId , $Action ) , 
00696                               $Code
00697                         );
00698                         
00699                         return( $Code );
00700                   }
00701                   catch( Exception $e )
00702                   {
00703                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00704                   }
00705             }

00733             function                process_search_form( $Str , $Changed )
00734             {
00735                   try
00736                   {
00737                         if( strpos( $Str , '{search_form}' ) !== false )
00738                         {
00739                               $Str = str_replace( '{search_form}' , '{search_form:prefix=common}' , $Str );
00740                         }
00741                         
00742                         $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'timestamp' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00743                         
00744                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'search_form' , $Rules ) ; )
00745                         {
00746                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00747                               
00748                               $Code = $this->compile_search_form( $this->BlockSettings );
00749                               
00750                               $Str = str_replace( "{search_form:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00751                               $Changed = true;
00752                         }
00753                         
00754                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00755                   }
00756                   catch( Exception $e )
00757                   {
00758                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00759                   }
00760             }

00788             function                process_public_search_form( $Str , $Changed )
00789             {
00790                   try
00791                   {
00792                         if( strpos( $Str , '{public_search_form}' ) !== false )
00793                         {
00794                               $Str = str_replace( '{public_search_form}' , '{public_search_form:prefix=custom}' , $Str );
00795                         }
00796                         
00797                         $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'timestamp' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00798                         
00799                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'public_search_form' , $Rules ) ; )
00800                         {
00801                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00802                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'prefix' , 'custom' );
00803                               
00804                               $Code = $this->compile_search_form( $this->BlockSettings );
00805 
00806                               $Str = str_replace( "{public_search_form:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00807                               $Changed = true;
00808                         }
00809                         
00810                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00811                   }
00812                   catch( Exception $e )
00813                   {
00814                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00815                   }
00816             }

00848             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00849             {
00850                   try
00851                   {
00852                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_search_form( $Str , $Changed );
00853                         
00854                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_public_search_form( $Str , $Changed );
00855                         
00856                         return( $Str );
00857                   }
00858                   catch( Exception $e )
00859                   {
00860                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00861                   }

00886             function                build_query_string( $Fields )
00887             {
00888                   try
00889                   {
00890                         $QueryString = '1 = 1';
00891                         
00892                         $SearchString = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_string' , 'string' , '' );
00893                         
00894                         if( $SearchString !== '' && isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00895                         {                             
00896                               $QueryString = '( '.$Fields[ 0 ]." LIKE '%".$SearchString."%'";
00897                               
00898                               for( $i = 1 ; $i < count( $Fields ) ; $i++ )
00899                               {
00900                                     $QueryString .= ' OR '.$Fields[ $i ]." LIKE '%".$SearchString."%'";
00901                               }
00902                               
00903                               $QueryString .= ' )';
00904                         }
00905                         
00906                         return( $QueryString );
00907                   }
00908                   catch( Exception $e )
00909                   {
00910                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00911                   }
00912             }
